name: Send an email notification for every new response in Tally
description: Streamline your response management process by automatically sending email notifications whenever a new response is received in Tally. This template connects Tally with Google Email, ensuring you never miss important feedback or submissions. Simply set up your Tally form to collect responses, and let Make handle the rest by notifying you via email instantly. Enhance your communication efficiency and stay on top of your responses effortlessly!
